document_data.mainbody:
The Prince Templars assumed rulership of the city-state of Westgate when King Thartryn III, and all heirs of the Ilistar Dynasty, died from plague in the .
This group served as the holy council of Westgate. The high priests that composed the ranks of the Prince Templars formed an oligarchic theocracy. The Prince Templars would hold power in Westgate until the , when they were overthrown by the mercenary lord Gostaraj.
